newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Abu Dhabi issues tender to sell June 4-6 jet fuel.
newsitem.headline: Abu Dhabi issues tender to sell June 4-6 jet fuel.

text.p: Abu Dhabi National OIl Co (ADNOC) has issued a tender to sell 25,000 tonnes of jet fuel for June 4-6 lifting on a free-on-board (fob) basis, traders said on Monday.
The tender closes on May 9 and bids will be valid until May 12.
In its last tender, ADNOC sold 25,000 tonnes of jet fuel to a U.S. trader at a premium of 25 cents per barrel above MidEast quotes for May 14-15 lifting, fob basis.
The market was surprised with the awarded price as most had expected the award to be made at a discount to MidEast quotes, traders said.
